settings.title: Shipping information
settings.content:
Shipping

  • Free Shipping on All Orders $100+
  • For orders under $100, shipping cost is $4.95.
  • Delivery time (US): First-Class USPS, 2–6 business days.
  • All orders ship from California, USA, within 24 hours of payment (except custom orders).
  • International: Shipping cost is calculated at checkout.

Returns

  • Free 60-Day Returns (US only)
  • Returns are processed through Happy Returns by PayPal: box-free, printer-free, and drop-off at thousands of Return Bar locations.
  • Limited to one free return label per order.
  • International returns are accepted, but return shipping costs are the customer’s responsibility.
  • Jewelry must be returned in new condition, unworn, and in their original box.

Gift Packaging

  • Every order arrives beautifully boxed and ready to gift – because unwrapping should feel just as special as the jewelry itself.

settings.testimonial: I’ve never left a review for anything in my life but I felt the need to for this beautiful ring! It’s even more amazing in person, I’m absolutely in love. You can tell it’s high quality, it shipped super fast, I’ve already gotten so many compliments on it. If I could give this ring and this business more than five stars I would ☺️
settings.author: Tess

settings.testimonial: Beautiful ring and quick shipping! Will definitely be purchasing more pieces.
settings.author: Rachel

settings.testimonial: Was Christmas shopping for other people and had to buy this beauty for myself ☺️super fast shipping and beautiful ring. Definitely will be ordering from this shop again.
settings.author: Kristine

settings.testimonial: I love both rings!!! They are so beautiful that I went and ordered another one ☺️
settings.author: Todd

settings.testimonial: Absolutely love this ring! Great ring for a middle finger- big, but not bulky. Great quality, fast shipping. Will buy from this shop again!
settings.author: Sam

beautiful piece, the stone shines very subtle but it's still amazing!

wear it every day!
thanks!
settings.author: Linda

settings.testimonial: I am so happy with this ring! It is beautiful and so unique! I have never found anything like it! Highly recommend, it also got here in good time.
settings.author: Mckenzie

settings.testimonial: Got exactly what was ordered, came quickly and the quality is quite nice! Will be purchasing more from this shop. In fact I've already purchased 3 more rings from here! Great prices for great quality!
settings.author: Heather

settings.text: We believe true beauty doesn’t come at the expense of the earth. Our process is rooted in slow fashion: small batches, lasting materials, and mindful making - always with care for the people and planet behind them. We use ethically sourced gemstones, selected with respect for both origin and impact.

settings.code:
WHY WE CREATE

This is jewelry made mindfully - designed to be worn often and treasured for years. We craft each piece to feel personal, real, and lasting. Honest materials, thoughtful design, and a deep connection to meaning.

custom_css: .custom-content {flex-wrap: nowrap; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; gap: 30px; max-width: 650px; margin: 0 auto;}

@media only screen and (max-width: 768px) {.custom-content {flex-wrap: nowrap; margin-right: 8px; margin-left: 8px; } .custom__item {flex: 0 1 auto; padding-left: 10px; padding-right: 10px; } .custom-content > :nth-child(1) {flex: 0 0 40%; } .custom-content > :nth-child(2) {flex: 0 0 60%; }}
advanced_content_wK989d.name: Why We Create

settings.title: How can I find my ring size?
settings.text: Please check out our ring size guide to know which size to order. For our wide-fit rings, we recommend sizing up!

settings.title: The product or size I want is out of stock. Will it restock?
settings.text: We generally restock our products every 2-3 weeks. You can sign up to be notified when it returns by picking your size and clicking the button that says "Let me know when it's back".

settings.title: What type of silver do you use to make your jewelry?
settings.text:
At Boho-Magic we use .925 sterling silver to create our jewelry. It’s important to note that sterling silver is not pure silver. 

In the case of common sterling silver, the alloy is 92.5% pure silver and 7.5% copper, nickel, or brass. At Boho-Magic, though, most of our alloys are nickel-free and consist mostly of copper and zinc. This specific composition is fundamental in producing sterling silver rings and it's the reason behind the presence of the Sterling Silver 925 hallmarks.

At Boho-Magic, our rings bear the mark "925" as a badge of honor, signifying a blend of 92.5% pure silver and 7.5% other metals, most commonly copper and zinc. This marriage of metals bestows upon sterling silver its strength, resilience, and radiance that catches the eye from across a crowded room.

To learn even more about .925 sterling silver, check out our article about this here.

settings.title: Can I return my order for a refund?
settings.text:
Yes! We accept 60-day free returns - no questions asked.
Use this link to return an order and get a refund or a replacement.

settings.title: Do you ship to my country?
settings.text: Yes! We ship worldwide from the United States 🎁

settings.code:
<script type="text/javascript">
  var _learnq = _learnq || [];
  var item = {
    Name: {{ product.title|json }},
    ProductID: {{ product.id|json }},
    Categories: {{ product.collections|map:'title'|json }},
    ImageURL: "https:{{ product.featured_image.src|img_url:'grande' }}",
    URL: "{{ shop.secure_url }}{{ product.url }}",
    Brand: {{ product.vendor|json }},
    Price: {{ product.price|money|json }},
    CompareAtPrice: {{ product.compare_at_price_max|money|json }}
  };
  _learnq.push(['track', 'Viewed Product', item]);
  _learnq.push(['trackViewedItem', {
    Title: item.Name,
    ItemId: item.ProductID,
    Categories: item.Categories,
    ImageUrl: item.ImageURL,
    Url: item.URL,
    Metadata: {
      Brand: item.Brand,
      Price: item.Price,
      CompareAtPrice: item.CompareAtPrice
    }
  }]);
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
var _learnq = _learnq || [];
function addedToCart() {
  fetch(`${window.location.origin}/cart.js`)
  .then(res => res.clone().json().then(data => {
    var cart = {
      total_price: data.total_price/100,
      $value: data.total_price/100,
      total_discount: data.total_discount,
      original_total_price: data.original_total_price/100,
      items: data.items
    }
    if (item !== 'undefined') {
      cart = Object.assign(cart, item)
    }
    _learnq.push(['track', 'Added to Cart', cart])
  }))
} 
(function (ns, fetch) {
  ns.fetch = function() {
    const response = fetch.apply(this, arguments);
    response.then(res => {
      if (`${window.location.origin}/cart/add.js`
      	.includes(res.url)) {
        	addedToCart()
      }
    });
    return response
  }
}(window, window.fetch))
$(document).ajaxComplete(function(event, request, settings){
  if(settings.url == "/cart/add.js"){
      addedToCart()
  }
})</script>
